string-array.name: tweet_text
string-array.item: #DVTvalue Make an impact - a positive impact to our customers' success, our team & in our communities - #DVTRefresh üìà
#DVTvalue Servant leadership - Leadership at DVT is more coaching, than telling people what to do. #DVTRefresh
#DVTvalue Safe to fail ‚Äì quick to grow and learn. Sometimes we mess up, but we learn fast. We value learning, not failing. #DVTRefresh
#DVTvalue Work-life balance - Life is about balance. At DVT we work hard so that we have time for fun. At work and at home. #DVTRefresh üèñüíª
#DVTvalue Own it ‚Äì do it. No one likes to nag. At DVT, when you commit to your team to get stuff done, then you get it done. #DVTRefresh
#DVTvalue Simplicity - The art of achieving maximum results with minimum effort. We work hard and like to achieve a lot, quickly. #DVTRefresh üéì
